name: Kiwi Apple Reposado Pop
preparation:
Contributed by Super Chunk Sweets and Treats

Is there anything better than a popsicle on a hot summer day? Absolutely—a kiwi-apple popsicle made with amazing tequila.

Mix all the ingredients in a large bowl. Using a funnel, pour 1⁄2 cup of liquid into an ice pop bag.

Tie a knot on the top, while squeezing out excess air.

Place in the freezer overnight.

Clip off the knotted portion of the bag to enjoy.
